headline: PFEIFFER VACUUM HELIUM LEAK DETECTOR
categories.lvl1: Vacuum Processing Equipment > Helium Leak Detectors
specstable:
Manufacturer Pfeiffer Vacuum
Model HLT 260 QualyTest
High Vacuum Pump Type Turbomolecular Pump
Maximum Permissible Inlet Pressure 18.00 mbar (13.50 torr)
Roughing Pump Capacity 84.77 l/m (3.00 CFM)
Test Port Connection KF25
Start Up Time 3 Min.
Helium Pumping Speed at Inlet 2.10 l/s (4.45 CFM)
Remote Control Capabilities Yes
Interface RS 232C
Audio Alarm with Variable Pitch Yes
Detectable Masses 2 AMU 3 AMU 4 AMU
Internal Calibrated Leak Included
Built-In Roughing Pump Included
Liquid Nitrogen Trap Not Included
Accessories

Remote keypad with extension cable

Other Information

Detectable gases He4; He3; H2
Lowest detectable leak rate according to AVS 2.1
He4, He3 <5×10-12 mbar l/s
H2 <5×10-8 mbar l/s
Highest detectable leak rate
He4, He3 1 mbar l/s
H2 1×10-2 mbar l/s

Detector is serviced and fully tested, total running hours 965.

Extended Description Details at Operating instructions of Pfeiffer HLT 260_275 Qualytest.pdf
Power Requirements 110/120 V 10.0 A 1 Phase
CE Marked YES
Year of Manufacture 2001
Weight 97 lb (44 kg)
